metadata.title: Steller Sea Lion Survival Rates and Long-term Dive Effort

creators.name: Texas A&M University, Laboratory for Applied Biotelemetry & Biotechnology

metadata.description:
Will be using satellite-linked mortality transmitters (SMXs) keeping track and control of the mammals alive and dead.  Test deployment on captive Steller sea lions.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supporting "Survival and long-term foraging behavior of juvenile Steller Sea Lions through satellite-linked transmitters" by NPMR

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Data will only be made available to other sources after publications of findings by authors

Use constraints: None
